about_the_game:
Wireframe Warfare is a Singleplayer Action/Tower Defense hybrid game created by a solo developer over the course of a year. Blast and strategize your way through various levels, combating waves of viruses attacking Cyber Beacons across the pathways of a digital space.

T.A.N.K (ACTION GAMEPLAY)

Tactical Armored Nexus Keeper, or T.A.N.K for short, is a customizable program with several different offensive weapons and modular attachments. During gameplay, you will be controlling your own version of a T.A.N.K, harnessing its power to defend the Cyber Beacons.

S.T.A.N.D (Tower Defense)

Secure Tower Allocation and Network Defense protocol is the foundation of your defense against Viruses. Deploy offensive towers to deal damage, defensive towers to debuff and utility towers to boost your resources.

Play Your Way

Use the Skill system to tailor the T.A.N.K program to your play style. Like to take hits and keep going? Boost your defense. Tired of having to refill your health or ammo? Boost those too!

In addition to skills, the T.A.N.K program can also use Attachments. Cosmetic items that boost stats like speed, defense, ramming damage and more. Swap these around to find the combo of Attachments that works best for you!

Customize Your T.A.N.K

Make the T.A.N.K program your own with cosmetic items and color variations.

name: Wireframe Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits or Later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1070Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
